caption:
“Insurance didn’t cover it.” 5 words that can ruin your investment. @padsplit’s GM reveals why insurance isn’t just a cost—it’s your safety net.

In this week’s #InvestSmart with Steadily, PadSplit’s GM shared great advice for landlords:
Avoiding common insurance pitfalls
Adapting to market challenges
Protecting investments in innovative housing
Real insights from real experiences.
Full episode on our YouTube channel. Link in bio.
